event_lines.line: Yo, heard some new kid just tore up The Pit in a BEATER. Street Heat salutes you, whoever you are.
Nova FM is hearing whispers about a newcomer making waves downtown. We love a debut.
Preston Wells got his car taken! Pink slips are NO JOKE, people!
SOMEBODY just pink-slipped Preston Wells! Piston Pete approves! That takes GUTS!
There's a new name buzzing around Nova Pacifica. You know who you are. Nova FM sees you.
Smooth K here... hearing a name more and more lately. Take it slow, newcomer. The city tests everyone.
Okay, okay, we gotta talk about this driver who's been CLEANING UP downtown. Respect. Big Torque sees you.
...The underground has noticed. Respect is earned, not given. You earned it. Phantom acknowledges.
Piston Pete here — and I gotta say, there's a driver in this city making EVERYONE nervous. I love it!
Real talk — there's a name out here that makes people look over their shoulder. Street Heat respects the grind.
Neon Nina here with a moment of silence... for every racer who has to share the road with a LEGEND. Nova FM salutes.
...Legend. The underground remembers every one. Your name joins the frequency. Phantom out.
Smooth K here... Sometimes the brightest lights burn out. But the road's still there in the morning.
Nova FM... we've seen stars rise and fall in this city. The neon doesn't judge. It just glows.
...The signal fades. But frequencies never truly die. Underground remembers.
...They're back. Underground heard it first. Phantom out.
WAIT. WAIT. Is that — they're BACK?! Piston Pete is LOSING IT right now! REDLINE RADIO, BABY!
Hold up, hold up... Big Torque just got word. The comeback is ON. Street Heat is HERE for this!
Scanner says someone just gave Nova Pacifica PD the SLIP. Big Torque salutes that driving!
Someone out there just outran the cops! Piston Pete says FLOOR IT AND NEVER LOOK BACK!
I hear there's a new machine on the streets of Nova Pacifica. Piston Pete wants to hear that engine ROAR!
Another pink slip race, another title changed hands! That's how we do it on the streets!
